function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 's<=n/2+1' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 's<=n/2+1' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'j<n-s-1' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'j<n-s-1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 's<=n/2+1' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<n-s-1' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'i (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'j (line 5)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'count' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'arr[i][j]=count++;' be considered dead code?
